message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit your business. Considering its value and the benefits it brings, I propose a price of $9,500 for the product.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you considering my needs. However, $9,500 is a bit higher than my budget allows.  I'd be willing to pay $8,500 for the product. This is a fair price considering the value I place on it. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to negotiate further. I propose a price of $9,000 for the product. This is a reasonable compromise between our positions and I believe it will be beneficial for both of us.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $9,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm sticking with my previous offer of $8,500. This price is fair considering the value I place on the product, and I believe it's a good compromise. I hope you can reconsider.

After careful consideration, I am willing to meet you halfway. I propose a final offer of $8,750 for the product. I believe this price reflects the value of the product while remaining within your budget. I hope this proposal is acceptable to you.

Alice, I appreciate your compromise, but $8,750 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $8,250. This is a fair price considering the value I place on the product and our back-and-forth negotiations. I hope you'll accept this final offer.

I understand your position, Bob. After reviewing the situation again, I am willing to accept $8,500 for the product. This is a fair compromise given the value you place on it and our previous discussions. I hope this offer meets your expectations.
